entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
